metadata.title: USN-7182-1 -- Ceph vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Ceph incorrectly handled unsupported JWT algorithms in the RadosGW gateway. An attacker could possibly use this issue to bypass certain authentication checks and restrictions.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7182-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  ceph - 17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2 ceph-base - 17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2 ceph-common - 17.2.7-0ubuntu0.22.04.2 ceph-fuse -
